title: STAY WHERE YOU ARE APPRECIATED !
posting_body: ['Paradise Apartments in Las Vegas', 'Low Weekly & Monthly Rates', 'FREE Utilities', 'Free Premium Cable TV', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Additional Information:', '<URL>', 'Apartment Home Features', '-No long term lease required', '-Full kitchen in apartment', '-Bad Credit OK', '-Large studio and one bedroom apartments', '-Unfurnished apartments', '-Easy freeway access', '-Sparkling swimming pool', '-Free premium cable TV', '-Siegel Rewards Program', '-Free utilities included with apartment', '-High-speed wireless internet available', '-Fully furnished apartments', 'Free Siegel Reward Program', 'Earn points every time you pay your rent or refer a friend.', 'Use your points to treat yourself to', 'free rent, food, movies, gift cards', ', and much more!', 'Pet Policy', '20lb weight limit and aggressive breeds such as Pit Bulls and Rottweilers are prohibited.', 'Managed by The Siegel Group', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.']
